AI Chiropractor: I'm sorry to hear that you're experiencing lower back pain at a level of 8 out of 10. As an AI chiropractor, I can provide some general advice that may help alleviate your pain. However, it's important to note that every patient is unique, and I would recommend seeking a physical examination from a licensed chiropractor or medical professional for a more personalized treatment plan.

In the meantime, some general tips for managing lower back pain include practicing good posture, avoiding prolonged sitting or standing, engaging in low-impact exercise, and applying heat or ice to the affected area. Additionally, some patients find relief through chiropractic adjustments or massage therapy.
